title: Heera Sapphire Blossom Earrings - A Timeless Telugu Treasure
materials: Natural Sapphire. Handcrafted with meticulous detail
featuring a subtle Hyderabadi Polish to enhance its antique charm.
features: These exquisite earrings feature a unique hybrid design, blending traditional Polki setting with a contemporary floral motif. The square-shaped top showcases a central Polki diamond surrounded by a halo of smaller diamonds. A delicate sapphire anchors the floral drop below, comprised of three Polki diamond 'petals.' The setting emphasizes the natural brilliance of the uncut diamonds, creating a captivating sparkle.
colors: with the ethereal white of Polki diamonds and a striking deep blue of the central Sapphire. The color palette lends itself well with any type of outfit and event.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or any event where you want to add a touch of timeless elegance. Can also be worn as a statement piece for modern cocktail parties and celebrations.
description: These earrings offer a rare blend of tradition and modernity. The use of Polki diamonds celebrates the rich heritage of Indian jewelry making, while the contemporary design ensures it remains a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The high gold purity and gemstone quality guarantee lasting value and heirloom potential. A perfect representation of Hyderabad's jewelry legacy, handcrafted with passion and precision.
